aboutmeRoles.role_description: Creating responsive, interactive web apps with React, ensuring seamless user experiences and clean, efficient code.
Developing scalable and efficient server-side applications using Node.js and Express.js.
Combining frontend and backend skills to deliver complete web solutions.

projects.title: Allianz Sub-Hub Application
projects.description: Created and maintained APIs for the Allianz Submission Hub Project using Unqork, Eigen and JavaScript, Designed and developed an intelligent PDF viewer within the Unqork platform to display extracted entity data alongside the original document with interactive highlights, Implemented secure document rendering, download, and print functionality using PDF.js, Blob APIs, and custom AngularJS directives, Developed robust logic for scrolling to specific highlights, fallback handling when coordinates are unavailable, and smooth integration with asynchronous data fetching.

projects.title: NxtWatch â€“ Video Streaming Platform
projects.description: Implemented Next Watch application which is a clone for YouTube where users can log in and can see a list of videos like Trending, Gaming, saved videos, and can search videos and view specific video details, and users can toggle the theme (Light/Dark).
projects.technologies_used: React JS, JavaScript, Routing, REST API Calls, CSS, Bootstrap, Authentication, Local Storage, JWT Token, Authorization

projects.title: portfolio
projects.description: A modern, responsive, and dynamic portfolio website to showcase my skills, projects, and experiences. Built with a focus on clean design, smooth user interactions, and professional presentation, This portfolio website serves as a personal showcase for my work as a web developer. It highlights my projects, skills, achievements, and provides a smooth contact experience for potential collaborators or employers.
projects.technologies_used: React JS, Routing, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, REST API Calls, Local Storage, JWT Token, Authentication, Authorization

experience.role_description: I am an enthusiastic software developer with 2 year of hands-on-experience in building scalable applications using low-code and no-code platforms like Unqork with Assosiate Certification. Over the past year, I have developed a solid understanding of application design and basic understanding of project creation in ZOHO Pages and ZOHO Creator, workflow automation and Integration with third-party services like Eigen to deliver the next generation in intelligent data extraction and document processing with cutting-edge NLP delivering superior results.

Designed and configured enterprise applications using Unqork no-code platform, reducing development time by 40%. Integrated Unqork workflows with third-party APIs (REST/SOAP) for seamless data exchange. Built dynamic forms, workflows, and dashboards to streamline business processes in insurance and financial domains. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver scalable, production-ready Unqork applications in an Agile environment.
